execution_plan.description: Count orders placed by customers in the EU who updated their customer record in the last 30 days (region = EU).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT 'EU' AS region, COUNT(o.id) AS orders_count
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.id
WHERE c.updated_at >= now() - interval '30 days';

execution_plan.description: Count orders placed by customers in the US who updated their customer record in the last 30 days (region = US).
execution_plan.query:
SELECT 'US' AS region, COUNT(o.id) AS orders_count
FROM customers c
JOIN orders o ON o.customer_id = c.id
WHERE c.updated_at >= now() - interval '30 days';
